name: Marian's Eye
description:
Under a creature playing God, a friend's identity and world are morphed over and over, trailing a girl down a path of self-discovery and reflection. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

A small kinetic novel made by Harriet Ford for the "TGD Cozy Jam"  2022 Game Jam. Word count: 2,469

If you would like to support me and my works, please consider purchasing the original soundtrack from my Bandcamp.

Current Game Version: 1.0. 

Harriet Ford (C) 2022. All Rights Reserved.

Content Warning: This game contains nudity.
